product_name: Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket - Women's
long_description: Carry the ultralight Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket for emergency storm protection on your treks. The waterproof/breathable shell employs two types of GORE-TEX(R) fabric for optimal performance. Compact, windproof GORE-TEX fabric with lightweight Paclite technology is used in the main body. High-wear areas are reinforced with durable 3L GORE-TEX with tricot technology. Low-profile hood with 1-handed cinch cords stows in the full stand-alone collar when the hood isn't needed; hood rotates with head without obscuring your vision. WaterTight(TM) pit zippers vent excess heat quickly. Hand pockets feature laminated WaterTight zippers. Laminated droptail back hem has an adjustable drawcord. Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket for women features a longer length for greater coverage and protection.
short_description: Carry the ultralight Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket for emergency storm protection on your treks. The waterproof/breathable shell employs two types of GORE-TEX(R) fabric for optimal performance.
